item.title: Dropbox in CentOs 7
item.author: mail@eucalypto.de (Viktor Papara)
item.description: Install Dropbox in CentOS 7 This website has a nice overview over the installation process. First, you need to sudo yum install libgnome and then download the Dropbox Fedora (.rpm) package from Dropbox and install it with sudo rpm -ivh nautilus-dropbox[...].rpm Then you can start Dropbox and log in with your accound details. Repair package manager yum If you use yum (e.g yum update) after Dropbox installation, you will probably encounter an error that a certain .
